description: The Toyota Hilux is your partner for work, adventure, or everyday driving. Choose from fuel-efficient diesel engines and conquer any terrain with its 4WD system. Whether you opt for the manual or automatic transmission, the Hilux offers versatility and capability in a stylish package. Tackle challenging jobs, explore hidden trails, or simply commute in comfort â€“ the Hilux is ready for anything.
features: Hill start assist control for easy inclines

Tackle tough jobs with its high payload capacity, making it a reliable workhorse. While it offers a single cabin for the driver, its focus lies on pure capability.

A strong engine and 4WD system take you anywhere, while the high payload lets you bring all the gear. Ideal for exploring or hauling heavy loads, this double cabin combines functionality with adventure.

description: Ensure a comfortable and safe journey for your passengers with the Toyota Coaster Bus. This spacious and reliable minibus features air conditioning, large windows for sightseeing, and multiple exits for easy access. Ideal for transporting groups, the Coaster prioritizes passenger comfort with its well-designed interior. Let your passengers relax and enjoy the ride while you navigate the roads with confidence.
features: Air conditioning and heating for passenger comfort

description: Elevate your travels with the luxurious GAC Trumpchi M8 MPV. Pamper your family or impress business associates with its spacious interior and panoramic sunroof. Advanced driver-assistance features ensure safety on every journey. Choose from a petrol or hybrid powertrain to suit your needs, and experience the pinnacle of comfort and technology on the road.
features: Panoramic sunroof for an airy feel

description: The 2024 Toyota Land Cruiser is a legendary full-size SUV known for its off-road prowess, luxurious interior, and advanced technology. It combines durability and reliability with comfort and convenience, making it a versatile choice for any adventure.
features: LED headlights with Adaptive Front-Lighting System (AFS)
Heated and ventilated front and rear seats

additional_informations.name: Performance
additional_informations.desc: The 2024 Land Cruiser is equipped with a powerful V6 engine and a hybrid variant, providing excellent power and efficiency. It offers a smooth ride on highways and robust performance off-road, with a towing capacity of up to 8,100 lbs.

additional_informations.name: Trims and Options
additional_informations.desc: The Land Cruiser is available in various trims, including Base, Heritage Edition, and Executive. Each trim offers unique features and upgrades, such as advanced off-road technologies, premium interior materials, and enhanced safety systems.

additional_informations.name: Off-Road Capability
additional_informations.desc: Built for adventure, the Land Cruiser features Toyota's advanced off-road systems like Multi-Terrain Select and Crawl Control. It also includes a locking center differential and skid plates, ensuring it can handle the toughest terrains and conditions.

description: The Toyota HiAce Van offers unmatched versatility, whether you need to transport passengers or cargo. Its flexible cargo space allows you to adapt to any hauling needs. Standard safety features ensure a secure ride, and the passenger van configuration boasts a comfortable cabin for a smooth journey for everyone on board. Let the HiAce Van be your reliable companion for work, errands, or family outings.
features: Cargo space flexibility for various needs
Safety features like airbags and ABS
disclaimers: Price varies depending on variant and options
Fuel efficiency may vary based on driving conditions and load

description: The Range Rover Sport is designed for both on-road and off-road performance. It offers a blend of dynamic handling, luxurious interior, and advanced technological features, making it suitable for diverse driving needs.
features: LED headlights with signature Daytime Running Lights (DRL)
Meridian Sound System or Meridian 3D Surround Sound System

additional_informations.name: Performance
additional_informations.desc: While not a sports car, the Range Rover Sport offers impressive acceleration and handling for an SUV. Engine options include mild-hybrid variants with strong horsepower, delivering a 0-60 mph time in as low as 5.9 seconds.

additional_informations.name: Trims and Options
additional_informations.desc: Several trims are available, including SE, HSE, First Edition, and Autobiography. Each offers increasing levels of luxury features and performance. Options include performance upgrades like a more powerful engine and sport suspension.

additional_informations.name: Off-Road Capability
additional_informations.desc: Don't let the sporty feel fool you; the Range Rover Sport retains Land Rover's off-road prowess. It features Land Rover's Terrain Response system with various settings for different terrains, and it boasts a wading depth of up to 850mm.

description: The Lexus GX is a rugged yet luxurious SUV designed for both city driving and off-road adventures. It combines advanced off-road capabilities with a spacious and comfortable interior, featuring cutting-edge technology and premium materials.
features: Mark Levinson Surround Sound Audio System

additional_informations.name: Performance
additional_informations.desc: The Lexus GX is powered by a robust V8 engine, delivering ample power and torque for both on-road and off-road driving. It offers a smooth and controlled ride, with the ability to handle challenging terrains with ease.

additional_informations.name: Trims and Options
additional_informations.desc: Available in multiple trims including the GX 460 and GX 460 Luxury. Each trim provides varying levels of luxury and technological enhancements, with options for premium audio systems, advanced safety features, and off-road packages.

additional_informations.name: Off-Road Capability
additional_informations.desc: The GX features a body-on-frame construction, full-time 4WD, and Lexus' Kinetic Dynamic Suspension System (KDSS). These elements combine to offer exceptional off-road performance, including the ability to navigate through rugged terrains and deep water crossings.

description: The Evoque features a modern and sophisticated design with advanced technology and luxurious amenities. It offers a range of high-end features tailored for comfort, convenience, and safety.

additional_informations.name: Trims and Customization
additional_informations.desc: While it comes in a single, fully-loaded Dynamic SE trim level in India, other regions might offer more options. The Evoque allows for some personalization through optional features and packages. Here are some possibilities: Black Pack: adds a more aggressive look with black exterior accents. Driver Assist Pack: includes advanced driver-assistance features like blind spot monitoring and adaptive cruise control. Cabin Upgrades: options like premium upholstery materials and a panoramic sunroof can further elevate the interior experience.

additional_informations.name: Off-Road Capability
additional_informations.desc: The Evoque might prioritize style, but it still offers some off-road capability: Terrain Response System: Select from various driving modes like Sand, Eco, or Mud & Ruts to optimize traction on different terrains. Wade Sensing: Helps you navigate through water crossings by displaying the water depth on the instrument cluster. Hill Descent Control: Maintains a controlled speed when going downhill for added confidence.

description: The Mercedes GLE is a stylish and luxurious SUV featuring redesigned headlamps, 100% LED lighting, and various wheel options from 19 to 22 inches. It combines sportiness with luxury, offering features like Nappa leather sport seats and a flat-bottom steering wheel.

additional_informations.name: Performance Options and Ride Quality
additional_informations.desc: While the GLE offers a comfortable ride, there are options for those who prioritize performance: AMG GLE 53: This variant features a powerful turbocharged inline-6 engine with an electric motor, offering exhilarating acceleration and sporty handling. Air Suspension: Available on some models, it provides exceptional ride quality and adjustable ground clearance for better off-road capability.

additional_informations.name: Technology and Driver Assistance
additional_informations.desc: The Mercedes-Benz User Interface (MBUX) is a highlight, featuring a large touchscreen display and voice recognition for intuitive control of infotainment and vehicle features. Advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) are available.

additional_informations.name: Cargo Space and Interior Options
additional_informations.desc: The GLE offers ample cargo space, with the option for a third-row seat to increase passenger capacity to seven. Interior material options range from luxurious leather to wood accents, allowing you to personalize the cabin to your taste.

description: The Mercedes-AMG G63 is a powerful and luxurious SUV known for its off-road capabilities and high-performance features.
features: Advanced safety and driver assistance systems
disclaimer: Specifications and features are subject to change without notice.

additional_informations.name: Off-Road Prowess
additional_informations.desc: The G 63 isn't just powerful; it's a beast off-road.
features: 4MATIC All-Wheel Drive with Three Differential Locks: This advanced system distributes power to all wheels and allows you to lock the front, rear, and center differentials for maximum traction in challenging terrain.
Approach, Breakover, and Departure Angles: These angles measure the G 63's ability to climb over obstacles and steep inclines.
Durable Construction: The body-on-frame chassis and high-strength materials ensure the G 63 can withstand tough off-road conditions.

additional_informations.name: On-Road Performance and Customization
additional_informations.desc: While the G 63 excels off-road, it also delivers surprising on-road performance.
features: AMG-tuned suspension: This suspension strikes a balance between off-road capability and comfortable handling on paved roads.
Multiple Drive Modes: Choose from various drive modes like Comfort, Sport, and Off-Road to optimize performance for different situations.
Customization Options: A variety of wheels, exterior accents, and interior trim packages allow you to personalize your G 63 to reflect your style.

additional_informations.name: Heritage and Legacy
additional_informations.desc: The Mercedes-Benz G-Class has a long and illustrious history, dating back to the 1970s. Originally designed for military use, it gained civilian popularity for its ruggedness and capability. The G 63 upholds this heritage while offering modern luxury and performance.

description: The Mercedes-Benz G500 is a luxury SUV that combines iconic design with advanced off-road capabilities. It features a rugged yet stylish exterior, and a luxurious, spacious interior with state-of-the-art technology and comfort.
features: Engine: 4.0-liter V8 biturbo engine producing 422 horsepower and 610 Nm of torque
Performance: 0-100 km/h in approximately 5.8 seconds, top speed of 250 km/h
Safety Features: Advanced Air Bags System (AABS), ABS, anti-theft alarm, blind spot warning, and more
Comfort and Convenience: Includes features like automatic air conditioning, ambient lighting, and a range of interior customization options
disclaimer: Actual vehicle specifications and features may vary based on the region and specificmmodel year. It's always best to consult the official Mercedes-Benz website or a local dealership for the most accurate and detailed information

dditional_Informations.name: Comparison to Mercedes-AMG G 63
dditional_Informations.desc: While both are powerful off-road performers, the G 500 stands out in a few ways: Engine: The G 500 features a twin-turbocharged V8 engine, offering excellent power without the slightly more extreme performance of the G 63's AMG-tuned V8. Focus: The G 500 prioritizes a balance of power, comfort, and off-road capability. It might appeal to drivers who want a luxurious SUV with impressive off-road prowess without the most extreme performance numbers. Price: The G 500 is generally priced lower than the G 63.

dditional_Informations.name: On-Road Comfort and Refinement
dditional_Informations.desc: The G 500 offers a surprisingly comfortable and refined ride for a boxy SUV. Here's what contributes: Suspension: The suspension is tuned to provide a balance between handling capability and a smooth ride on various road surfaces. Luxurious Interior: High-quality materials, comfortable seating, and advanced noise cancellation create a tranquil cabin environment. Technology Features: The Mercedes-Benz User Interface (MBUX) infotainment system with a large touchscreen and voice commands enhances comfort and convenience.

description: The Lexus LX 600 is known for its robust off-road capabilities paired with luxury features, offering a smooth ride and extensive amenities.
features: Sunroof, heated and ventilated seats, head-up display, surround-view camera, adaptive cruise control, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, wireless phone charging.
disclaimer: Specifications may vary based on the market and model year

additional_informations.name: Luxury Interior Features
additional_informations.desc: The LX 600 boasts a luxurious and technology-packed interior: Spacious Cabin with Three-Row Seating: The LX 600 comfortably seats seven passengers with ample legroom and headroom in all three rows. Premium Materials: Lexus uses high-quality materials throughout the cabin, including leather upholstery, wood trim accents, and soft-touch surfaces. Advanced Technology: The Lexus Interface infotainment system features a large touchscreen display, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and a premium Mark Levinson sound system. Comfort Features: Amenities like heated and ventilated seats, a panoramic moonroof, and four-zone climate control enhance passenger comfort on every journey.

additional_informations.name: Off-Road Capability
additional_informations.desc: While known for luxury, the LX 600 offers impressive off-road capability: All-Wheel Drive System: The advanced all-wheel-drive system with various drive modes like Mud, Sand, and Deep Snow optimizes traction on different terrains. Hill Descent Control and Crawl Control: These features help you maintain a controlled speed while going downhill or navigating challenging terrain. Ground Clearance: The LX 600 has ample ground clearance to handle uneven surfaces and obstacles.

additional_informations.name: Lexus Safety System+ 3.0
additional_informations.desc: This advanced driver-assistance system includes features like Pre-Collision System with Automatic Emergency Braking: Warns you of potential frontal collisions and can apply automatic braking to help avoid them. Lane Departure Alert with Steering Assist: Alerts you if you unintentionally stray from your lane and can gently nudge you back. Blind Spot Monitoring: Warns you of vehicles in your blind spot when changing lanes. Lexus anticipates adding even more advanced features in the future.

description: The Lexus RX offers a blend of luxury and performance, featuring advanced technology, premium materials, and a powerful engine. It is designed to deliver a smooth and refined driving experience, both on and off-road
features: Engine: 3.4 L V6 Twin-turbo producing 409 hp
Infotainment: Advanced multimedia system with a high-definition display
Interior: Premium leather seating, adjustable seating configurations
Exterior: Sleek design with LED headlights, customizable exterior options
disclaimer: The specifications mentioned above are standard and may vary based on the model and optional packages selected.

additional_informations.name: Previously Offered Features (may vary depending on model year)
additional_informations.desc: The RX 350 offered a comfortable and refined cabin with three-row seating for seven. High-quality materials like leather upholstery and wood trim accents were common. The 3.5-liter V6 engine provided enough power for most driving situations. Lexus is known for its reliability, and the LX 350 was expected to last for many years with proper maintenance. All-wheel drive and features like hill descent control helped the RX 350 handle light off-road trails.

additional_informations.name: Things to Consider When Looking at a Used Lexus RX 350
additional_informations.desc: Features, technology, and performance might vary depending on the RX 350's model year. Research the specific year you're interested in to understand its exact features and capabilities. As with any used car, thoroughly inspect the vehicle's condition and check the mileage history. Consider a pre-purchase inspection by a trusted mechanic. While Lexus vehicles are known for reliability, replacement parts and service costs might be higher compared to some common car brands.

description: The Toyota Veloz is a 7-seater MPV (Multi-Purpose Vehicle) that is marketed in Southeast Asian countries like the Philippines, Indonesia, and Thailand. It is positioned as a stylish and feature-rich option for families. Here's a breakdown of the Toyota Veloz's key features: Design: The Veloz has a modern and sophisticated design with a bold front grille, sharp LED headlights, and 17-inch alloy wheels. It also has a spacious and comfortable interior with three rows of seating. Engine: The Veloz is powered by a 1.5-liter 4-cylinder engine that produces 106 horsepower and 138 Nm of torque. It is available with either a CVT (Continuously Variable Transmission) or a manual transmission. Fuel Economy: The Veloz is known for its fuel efficiency, thanks to its lightweight construction and efficient engine. Features: The Veloz comes with a variety of features, including a touchscreen infotainment system, automatic climate control, power windows and locks, and a rearview camera. Higher-end variants may also include features like leather seats, a sunroof, and advanced driver-assistance systems. Seating: The Veloz can seat up to seven passengers comfortably. The second-row seats are foldable and can be tumbled forward to provide easy access to the third-row seats. The third-row seats can also be folded flat to provide more cargo space. Overall, the Toyota Veloz is a well-rounded MPV that offers a good balance of style, comfort, practicality, and fuel efficiency. It is a great option for families who are looking for a versatile and reliable vehicle.

Nissan offers a diverse range of petrol-powered vehicles, including sedans, SUVs, crossovers, hatchbacks, and pickup trucks. Known for their reliability, performance, and innovative features, Nissan petrol vehicles cater to a wide range of drivers' needs and preferences.
features: Enhanced Safety and Driver Assistance Technologies

additional_informations.name: Autonomous Driving Capabilities
additional_informations.description: Nissan may integrate autonomous driving technologies into its petrol vehicles, allowing for hands-free driving in certain conditions. This could include features like highway autopilot and advanced parking assistance systems.

additional_informations.name: Augmented Reality Displays
additional_informations.description: Future Nissan models could incorporate augmented reality (AR) heads-up displays or windshield overlays to provide drivers with real-time information, navigation guidance, and safety alerts without taking their eyes off the road.

additional_informations.name: Advanced Vehicle-to-Everything (V2X) Communication
additional_informations.description: Nissan may implement V2X communication technology in its petrol vehicles, enabling them to communicate with other vehicles, infrastructure, and pedestrians to improve safety, traffic flow, and efficiency.

additional_informations.name: Health and Wellness Monitoring
additional_informations.description: Nissan could introduce health and wellness monitoring systems that use biometric sensors to track driver fatigue, stress levels, and overall well-being, providing alerts and recommendations to ensure safe driving.

additional_informations.name: Advanced Materials and Manufacturing Techniques
additional_informations.description: Nissan may leverage advanced materials such as carbon fiber, aluminum alloys, and high-strength steel, along with innovative manufacturing techniques like 3D printing, to enhance vehicle durability, performance, and efficiency.

The Highlander Hybrid offers even better fuel economy, with estimates reaching up to 36 mpg combined.

additional_information.description: The Toyota Highlander comes with a suite of standard safety features, including automatic emergency braking with pedestrian detection, lane departure warning, and adaptive cruise control. additional_information.description: Available technology features include a large touchscreen infotainment system with wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility, a panoramic sunroof, and a JBL premium sound system.

description: The Toyota Land Cruiser Prado is a rugged and reliable SUV that's renowned for its off-road capabilities and durability. It's a smaller variant of the classic Toyota Land Cruiser, designed to offer similar toughness in a more compact package. The Prado is popular worldwide, especially in regions where rough terrain and challenging driving conditions are common. It's often praised for its comfortable ride, spacious interior, and impressive towing capacity, making it a versatile choice for both everyday driving and adventurous off-road trips.
features: Qi Wireless Charging and USB-C Charging Ports

description: The Toyota Land Cruiser is a robust and reliable SUV, renowned for its off-road capabilities, luxurious interior, advanced technology, and powerful performance, making it ideal for both adventure and everyday driving.
features: Outside Rear View Mirror: Powered, Heated, Anti Glare, Chrome Plated with Puddle Lamps

description: The Toyota Sienna is a versatile and spacious minivan, perfect for families and those who need ample cargo space. With a hybrid electric powertrain, the Sienna offers impressive fuel efficiency and a smooth driving experience. The all-wheel-drive system provides confidence in various driving conditions.

The Hyundai Tucson is a compact SUV that offers a comfortable and capable driving experience. With a range of fuel-efficient engines and available all-wheel drive, the Tucson is ready for both city streets and off-road adventures. Its stylish design, spacious interior, and advanced technology features make it a popular choice for those seeking a versatile and modern SUV.
features: Drive mode select - Eco, Normal, Sport

description: The Toyota Fortuner is a mid-size SUV that shares its platform with the Toyota Hilux pickup truck. It's designed to offer ruggedness, versatility, and off-road capability while providing comfort and convenience for both on-road and off-road driving. Here's a description of its key features:
features: VSC (Vehicle Stability Control) with BA (Brake Assist)
Anti Theft Alarm with Ultrasonic Sensor and Glass Break Sensor
Front Seats: WIL Concept Seats [Whiplash Injury Lessening]
Child Restraint System: ISOFIX + Tether Anchor on 2nd Row

additional_information.name: Exterior Design
additional_information.desc: The Fortuner boasts a bold and muscular exterior design, with prominent wheel arches, a high ground clearance, and a distinctive front grille that exudes a sense of strength and capability. Its robust appearance is complemented by features like roof rails and alloy wheels.

additional_information.name: Engine Options
additional_information.desc: Depending on the market, the Fortuner is typically available with a range of diesel and gasoline engines, providing a balance between performance and fuel efficiency. These engines are often paired with manual or automatic transmissions, offering flexibility for different driving preferences.

additional_information.name: Off-Road Capability
additional_information.desc: Like its sibling, the Toyota Land Cruiser Prado, the Fortuner is known for its off-road prowess. It features robust underpinnings, including a sturdy ladder-frame chassis and a capable four-wheel-drive system, making it well-suited for tackling challenging terrain.

additional_information.name: Interior Comfort and Features
additional_information.desc: Inside, the Fortuner offers a spacious and comfortable cabin with seating for up to seven passengers, depending on the configuration. The interior is often well-appointed, with quality materials, modern design elements, and a range of convenience features such as touchscreen infotainment systems, climate control, and various connectivity options.

additional_information.name: Safety Features
additional_information.desc: Safety is a priority in a Fortuner, with advanced features like multiple airbags, stability control, traction control, anti-lock brakes, and a suite of driver assistance technologies, depending on the model and trim level. These features help ensure peace of mind for both the driver and passengers.

description: The BYD Atto 3 is a mid-size electric SUV that combines a sporty design with a focus on performance and technology. It boasts a powerful electric motor, a spacious and comfortable interior, and an impressive driving range. The BYD e-Platform 3.0, designed specifically for EVs, underpins the vehicle, aiming for better performance, safety, and efficiency.
features: Blade Battery: BYD's proprietary lithium iron phosphate (LFP) battery technology, known for safety and durability.
Fast charging capability: 0 to 80% in 50 minutes (using an 80 kW DC charger)
Driver-assistance features include automatic emergency braking, lane departure warning, and blind spot monitoring (availability may vary depending on market)

With a focus on fuel efficiency, space, safety, and reliability, the Highlander Hybrid is a compelling choice for families and those seeking a well-rounded SUV.

description: The MG 5 is a compact car with a history spanning over a decade. It's offered as a sedan in some markets, and a hatchback version might be available in the future. The first generation, launched in 2012, came with a 1.5-liter naturally-aspirated petrol engine in two power options paired with either a manual or automatic transmission. A newer generation debuted in August 2023, featuring a 1.5-liter engine with both naturally-aspirated and turbocharged options, along with CVT and DCT transmissions.

additional_informations.name: Model Variations
additional_informations.desc:
Howo dump trucks come in a variety of configurations to suit different needs. Here are some examples:
  * Howo A7: Lighter duty option with a payload capacity around 20-25 tons.
  * Howo dump truck ZZ:** More powerful option with a payload capacity around 30-40 tons.
  * Howo dump truck T7H:** Heavy duty option designed for extreme loads up to 50 tons.

additional_informations.name: Customizations

additional_informations.name: Iveco Truck Models
additional_informations.desc:
Iveco offers a comprehensive lineup of trucks to cater to diverse needs. Here are some prominent categories:
  * Iveco Daily: Light-duty trucks ideal for urban deliveries and light construction tasks.
 * Iveco Eurocargo: Medium-duty trucks for regional distribution, waste collection, and construction applications.

additional_informations.name: Scania Truck Series
additional_informations.desc:
Scania offers a variety of truck series to cater to specific applications:
  * Scania L-series: Urban trucks for distribution and waste collection.
  * Scania P-series: Construction and regional distribution trucks.
  * Scania G-series: Long-haul trucks with a focus on driver comfort and fuel efficiency.
* Scania R-series: Long-haul trucks with a focus on power and performance.
* Scania S-series: Premium long-haul trucks with the highest power ratings and luxurious cabs.

additional_informations.name: Focus on Sustainability
additional_informations.desc:
Scania is committed to sustainable transportation solutions. They offer:
  * Biogas-powered trucks that reduce CO2 emissions.
  * Electric trucks for urban applications with zero emissions.
  * Continuous development of fuel-efficient engines and technologies
